title: Lee Anderson: MP suspended from Tory party over 'Islamists' comments

title: Rishi Sunak: We will always stand with Ukraine and hold Putin to account

title: Send frozen Russian cash to Kyiv, says Rishi Sunak
description: Rishi Sunak has backed plans to send Ukraine billions of pounds in interest from frozen Russian assets as world leaders gathered in Kyiv to mark the second anniversary of the war. In an article for The Sunday Times, the prime minister also said that he wan ...

title: Sunak to hold regional Cabinet as local transport fund announced
description: The Prime Minister said there is a ‘clear plan to level up our country’ by investing in projects across the North and the Midlands.

title: 'Local transport fund' Cabinet meeting coming North after HS2 axe
description: The new fund will see Rishi Sunak visit the North of England as he discloses how money from the abandoned HS2 plans will be shared across regional councils

title: UK and US launch strikes against Houthis after surge in attacks on shipping

title: Taxpayer-funded bodyguards and cars ‘provided to more MPs due to safety fears’
description: Taxpayer-funded bodyguards and cars have reportedly been provided to more MPs amid growing fears for their safety. A rising number of politicians have been assessed to be at risk and are being provided with close protection by private security personnel, the Sunday Telegraph reported.

title: UK PM Sunak says West should be bolder about seizing Russian assets
description: Western nations should be bolder about confiscating Russian assets which they froze after the country's full-scale invasion of Ukraine in 2022, British Prime Minister Rishi Sunak said. Sunak, in an article in an early edition of the Sunday Times to mark two years since the start of the conflict,

title: The Prime Minister In Waiting - but who really is Keir Starmer?
description: The man himself may insist it isn't over until the votes are in, but Keir Starmer looks likely to be the next prime minister. Who is he and how did he get here? And why do those close to him feel the public doesn't see all of what they see?

title: Rishi Sunak's £5 billion transport plan to "fire up" the north
description: RISHI Sunak vowed to revitalise Britain’s forgotten regions by pumping almost £5billion into improving transport links. The PM will use cash saved by scrapping the northern leg of HS2 to upgrade roads, rail and bus services in “red wall” areas.

title: UK and US launch strikes against Houthis after surge in attacks on shipping
description: The UK and US have launched another round of missile strikes against Houthi targets in Yemen after a surge in attacks around the Red Sea by the Iran-backed group. American and British fighter jets hit sites in eight locations, according to US officials.

title: PM’s silence is ‘tacit endorsement of vile remarks’ by Anderson, says mayor
description: Former deputy party chairman Lee Anderson lost the Tory whip after refusing to apologise for the remarks on ‘Islamists’. | ITV National News

title: MPs ‘issued with bodyguards over fears about their safety’ as UK extremism rises
description: The number of MPs requiring protection is understood to have risen in the wake Hamas invasion of Israel on 7 October

title: Sadiq Khan calls Tories morally rotten and says PM’s silence on Lee Anderson makes Muslims fair game
description: London mayor says Islamophobia is tolerated from the top after former Tory deputy chair’s “anti-Muslim” GB News rant

title: MPs urge UK to ‘spearhead’ efforts to free Briton from Russian prison
description: MPs pile pressure on Lord Cameron to help dissident Vladimir Kara-Murza amid fears he could be next Putin victim

title: 'Rishi Sunak should kick out national embarrassment Liz Truss too - but he is too weak'
description: Writing for the Mirror, Labour Party Chair Anneliese Dodds says it's 'appalling' Lee Anderson would have remained a Tory MP if he'd apologised for Sadiq Khan slur

title: Anderson has Tory whip suspended after ‘refusal to apologise’ for Islamist claim
description: Lee Anderson has been suspended from the Conservative Party after drawing widespread criticism for claiming that “Islamists” have “got control” of London Mayor Sadiq Khan. The decision was taken following the former Tory deputy chairman’s “refusal to apologise” for the remarks made on Friday, a spokesperson for chief whip Simon Hart said.

title: Rishi Sunak vows to back Ukraine until it prevails on war anniversary
description: The Prime Minister said ‘tyranny will never triumph’ as President Volodymyr Zelensky’s troops defend the country against an emboldened Russia.

title: Rural Right-wing voters abandon Tories in huge switch to Reform UK
description: Former Conservative voters living in the countryside are shifting allegiance to Richard Tice’s party, suggests poll by Labour think tank
